content.question: What is the slope of the line tangent to the curve <math alttext="x squared times y, plus y squared, equals 21" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>21</mn></mrow></math> at the point <math alttext="with coordinates 2 comma 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></math> ?

unit.text: 3: Differentiation: Composite, Implicit, and Inverse Functions
